website_summaries.verdict: An 11-piece kit that includes everything you need to perform the perfect car wash.
pros: Includes a heavy-duty detailing bucket that is 30% thicker than competitors' buckets for ultimate durability
Comes with an ultra-soft microfiber wash mitt and drying towels that make it easy to remove heavy debris
Features specialty car wash soaps that deliver proven results
cons: Large sprayer that is included in the kit does not fit inside the bucket

customer_reviews.title: The Chemical Guys wheel brush I bought has also been a disappointment. The bucket and lid are great
customer_reviews.text: The washing mitt has started to come apart at the seams after only using it twice. I have been following all of the care instructions and I even bought the Microfiber Wash. I bought an additional black mitt that is still in the package that I was going to use exclusively on my wheels, but I'm probably going to send it back. The Chemical Guys wheel brush I bought has also been a disappointment. The bucket and lid are great. The cleaning products seem fine. Hopefully the towels hold up to the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: MCI

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, crappy container's
customer_reviews.text: First off let me start by saying Chemical Guys makes some excellent products. With that being said I was beyond excited to get my new supplies. Unfortunately upon opening the bucket I had noticed some how a bottle had opened (even though it was sealed and wrapped in plastic), now the inside of the bucket looks like someone cleaned a crime scene with it as it is full of red tire gel. At least it smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SHOWROOM CLEAN !
customer_reviews.text: 2018 White Camry owner, since my whole top is glass it’s been difficult to find a car soap that is tough on dirt but gentle on my car paint/smokeglass top- the bright green citrus bottle cuts off greasy prints on my glass even the water won’t stay in place- omg I’m so glad I purchase this kit. I can see the difference in the formula versus other soap brands that leave a film of residue, plus a little goes a long way don’t be fooled by the small bottle - great job chemical guys I have not seen my car this clean since I took my baby out the Toyota show room ! You gain a fan !
customer_reviews.author: ARIEL

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Foamy Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great quality kit for the car fanatic! I also bought some more of their towels and a Karcher K3 pressure washer and foam cannon. I use the Chemical Guys soap in the Karcher foam cannon. This gives me a better wash than any drive-through and it will easily pay for itself in cost and time-savings over this summer. The microfiber towels are enormous and the two are enough to dry a medium sized car wonderfully. The quality of everything is fantastic and I think this kit would make a fantastic gift for someone who's bought a new car or for your own car care.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: ... enjoying these products the wash and gloss is really nice and so is the shampoo and i dont think ...
customer_reviews.text: really enjoying these products the wash and gloss is really nice and so is the shampoo and i dont think ive ever had a mitten that was so thick i mean this thing is awsome not the mention the drying towels are quite large i would buy it again forsure
customer_reviews.author: Spijackled

customer_reviews.title: Quality Not up to standard
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality the towels had some sort of glue on the edge of the seams. I tried washing them and still wouldn't get off. The soap is okay at best and they need to do a better job packing as some of the bottles spilled. the grit guard does not sit flush at the bottom high on one side so grit comes back up when you agitate the mitten. the Mitten and bucket were probably the best out of the entire kit. I would not give them a try again until they can consistently deliver.
customer_reviews.author: remix405

customer_reviews.title: rip off
customer_reviews.text: overlooked this $80 kit. thought it came with foam cannon and other stuff. this kit is simply a rip off. all you get is $40 worth of stuff and they charge you $80. do noty buy, look at the other kits or make your own. you are better off making your own kit on here. ugh $80 for your bucket, some soap, rim gel cleaner, a wash mit and a couple fiber cloths ? absolute rip off i could have ordered all this separately for half.
customer_reviews.author: M.M

customer_reviews.title: So shiny!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what is in that soap - but my cars are shining like new two weeks after washing. They look fantastic. I just used the soap, bucket, filter, and microfiber mitt. I haven't even cracked the seal on the other bottles of goodies yet. If this soap kicks so much butt on it's own, I can't imagine what the specialized wheel cleaner, etc. does!
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is everything you need! The soaps get even the toughest road grime off and make your vehicle squeaky clean. The wheel and tire soap and sprayer is great as well! And I can dry the whole truck with just one of the microfiber towels. Would recommend and plan on purchasing from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Markie Jerkins

customer_reviews.title: not durable for the money
customer_reviews.text: my son has faithfully followed this company . so when i could get him this gift set i was very happy. the green hand mitt got holes in the seams right off and the chamois the same. His car looks great ,i just question the price when my neighbors car looks the same using cheaper items.
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing products
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had a second bucket. Oh well. But anyways this worked amazing. I ordered this plus some more chemical guys products for tire shine and interior, even their butter wax. Loved them all. Towels are amazing, one towel was enough to dry the entire car. The mitt works amazing too. End results made me feel like a bought a new car. It looked amazing. Well worth it, especially if you're tired of the local car wash scratching your paint.
customer_reviews.author: APrime Tower

customer_reviews.title: Nice wash kit, car look great.
customer_reviews.text: First time using Chemical Guys products, they are pricey. But I must say my car looks better than ever. The wash products and gloss enhancers make a noticeable difference in shine. And the 2 thick dry towels included are the most absorbent I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: kevin h.

customer_reviews.title: Leaky bottles
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing particularly wrong with the product. I knew what I was ordering. The main problem was leaking containers which left liquid all over items such as microfiber towels which I had to launder before using and having to wipe everything down. I'm not sure whose fault that was.
customer_reviews.author: Burt Thorp

customer_reviews.title: Great, only one problem though
customer_reviews.text: Great product! This stuff is amazing. I was skeptical at first about buying it but I don’t regret it one bit. The only issue I can identify is that the leather conditioner does not protect against dye transfer.
customer_reviews.author: Doc1103

customer_reviews.title: Love this kit from Checmical Guys
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit from Checmical Guys. The only thing that I would add is a wheel brush to clean your wheels. It makes life a whole lot easier. This kit does everything though, and leaves a great smell and a very clean vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Simpson IV

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted great gift for some one serious about a clean car ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted great gift for some one serious about a clean car or in my case jeep pair up with a good foam cannon or foam gun can't go wrong
customer_reviews.author: dylan

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit actually. Comes with great stuff to clean your car/cars with. The diablo is amazing for rims. The orange soap is great at cleaning the paint. And the Mr pink is great for a foam gun. I was most surprised by the shine as you dry. It left no watter spots on the car at all. I clean with well watter and have always had water spots. Definetly worth the money
customer_reviews.author: jonathan b.

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my son and his new car. He is very happy with the results, keeping his car shining like new. Comes with everything you could ever want to keep your car in tip top shape!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Thorne

customer_reviews.text: Will remove ceramic glaze!!! This is NOT emphasized by seller- I read this in a comment line. The products are over priced for the amount in kit.

customer_reviews.title: Shiny
customer_reviews.text: I have used all of the products in the kit, the results are amazing. The citrus wash and shine does just that, cleans really well and leaves an amazing shine. Do not miss out on these products or do, so my truck will look better than yours.

customer_reviews.text: This set comes with everything one needs to get started with washing your own auto. Love the design of the trap insert for the bucket bottom. Everything works great.

customer_reviews.title: Good kit, except for the mitt
customer_reviews.text: I washed my car with this kit for the first time today. The mitt didn’t even make it 30 seconds before it had completely split down the seam and was ready to be thrown in the garbage. On the plus side, the microfiber towels are large and absorbent and there is a good assortment of car shampoos.

I'm not sure how much all the pieces are individually, but sometimes the convenience of everything in one buy makes it worth it. It is expensive, though.

customer_reviews.text: The first couple of washes seemed to be great, but I'm attaching a picture of what happened after I washed my car yesterday in perfect weather. I've got spots all over the vehicle; which seems like soap scum or something? I most certainly took the time to wash and dry by hand using the fiber towels and included spray. Original Review was 5 Stars, but with this I've reduced it to 2 star. Once I'm home and able to wash the vehicle again, and dry it, we'll see what happens​ and I'll update.

customer_reviews.title: The RED Diablo Gel crap leaked all over everything during shipment
customer_reviews.text: The RED Diablo Gel crap leaked all over everything during shipment. It was a sticky mess. I contacted Chemical Guys and they said it was not their problem. My wife and I spent a lot of time cleaning the bucket and contents but we still get Diablo sticky foam whenever we use the bucket or cloth to wash our 2016 Camaro. I guess Chemical Guys aren't making enough money and they feel inclined to blow off their customers when their products fails to perform.

customer_reviews.author: Dane

product_meta.title: Chemical Guys HOL121 Best Car Wash Bucket Kit (11 Items)
product_meta.description: Style:Wash Bucket KitNew to detailing? Using dad's old rusty bucket and dirty rags to wash the family car? Don't know what the pros use for the perfect detail? Chemical Guys has you covered! Chemical Guys have combined the best-selling fan favorites and newest car wash products into the Best Car Wash Bucket Kit. A perfect scratch-free shine starts with proper car wash and dry techniques and products, and the all new bucket kit contains everything you need for a weekly wash on any car, truck, motorcycle, or SUV. Rinse away dirt and grime and add deep gloss and shine with the slick Mr. Pink car wash shampoo. Choose Citrus Wash & Gloss for removing heavy duty stuck-on dirt, bugs, and grime. Hold mountains of foamy car wash suds in the Heavy Duty Detailing Bucket, and drop in a Grit Guard insert to hold abrasive dirt and debris at the bottom and away from clean water and soap. Separating dirt and debris away from the premium Chenille Microfiber Wash Mitt reduces the amount of dirt rubbed back onto the paint to cause swirls and scratches. Car drying is another crucial point for preventing scratches, so lubricate the surface and release stuck-on water with After Wash spray and a premium Miracle Dryer Microfiber Towel. Snap on the heavy duty Bucket Lid and sit on the top to easily clean wheels with Diablo Wheel Gel to remove nasty dust and grime from alloy rims and steel wheels. The Best Car Wash Bucket Kit is the one easy-to-use kit that allows any detailing enthusiast to get professional results with every car wash.
feature_bullets: Easy to use kit combines everything needed for the perfect car wash
Wash away dirt and grime with heavy duty bucket, slick wash soap, and soft wash mitt
Choose Mr. Pink for light duty cleanings, or Citrus Wash & Gloss for heavy duty dirt, bugs, and grime
Control abrasive dirt and debris with Grit Guard insert to reduce swirls and scratches (Grit Guard color may vary)
Snap on the Bucket Lid to make a fast and convenient seat, stool, or step

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars436 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
